name: The Zhel's Revenge
description:
A few hours of sleep, another few having pizza and a lot of hours developing.

The game ambient is another planet where you control Zhel, a evil witch. During the gameplay you have to fight with anothers tribes and break your believes and rituals to aquire more force and power.

A Global Game Jam Game

Jam Year: 2016

Credits:

Ramon Felipe - Programing & UI

Andrei Brongel - Programing & Animation

Suelem Suemi - 3D Art & Game Design

Rafael Alexandre - 3D art & Rigging

Isabelle de Alencar - Sound design & Story
